those vols. not in another series and those vols. also in following series: MAP technical reports series; Reports and studies, issued with the Joint Group of Experts on the Scientific Aspects of Marine Pollution (also called GESAMP reports and studies)
those vols. also in series: Topic review, issued by the South Pacific Regional Environment Programme (also called SPREP topic review)
Technical report. Generally, issues of this series are uncataloged in LC; they are in the Science and Technology Division. Cataloged volumes can be found by searching for the series heading above.
Also issued and/or distributed by UNEP's Oceans and Coastal Areas Programme Activity Centre in Nairobi, Kenya
